document.docAuthor: Yang, Lin, Chen, Xiang-Sheng & Li, Zi-Zhong
document.masterDocTitle: Review of the bamboo-feeding species of tribe Evacanthini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) with description of two new species from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the bamboo-feeding species of tribe Evacanthini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) with description of two new species from China

heading.emphasis: Key to the bamboo-feeding species of Evacanthini from China (males)

paragraph.keyLead:
1 . Anteclypeus and lorum yellowish white, without any markings (
Figs 35
, 45 , 55 , 115 , 125 )............................ 2

- Anteclypeus and lorum with brown or blackish brown markings (
Figs 5
, 15 ,
25 , 65
,
75 , 85
,
95 , 105
).................... 6

2 . Postclypeus with blackish brown marking laterally (
Figs 35
, 45 )................................................ 3

3 . Ventral process of male pygofer with many long macrosetae apically (
Fig. 36
).................
Carinata kelloggii ( Baker )

- Ventral process of male pygofer without macrosetae (
Fig. 46
)........................
Carinata nigrofasciata
Li & Wang

4 . Costal margin of forewing with large hyaline marking near middle (
Figs 51, 53
, 121, 123 )............................ 5

- Costal margin of forewing without hyaline marking at middle (
Figs 111, 113
)...............
Taperus fasciatus
Li & Wang

5 . Costal margin of forewing with the hyaline marking slender rectangular, longer than one third of costal margin (
Figs 51, 53
)..........................................................................
Convexana fleura Chen, Yang
& Li

- Costal margin of forewing with the hyaline marking oval, less than one third of costal margin (
Figs 121, 123
)................................................................................
Taperus luchunensis Zhang, Zhang & Wei

- Crown with median longitudinal carina normal (
Figs 4
, 14 ,
24 , 64
,
74 , 84
,
94
), not lamellate.......................... 7

8 . Claval area of forewing with yellowish brown marking (
Figs 11
, 61 )............................................. 9

- Claval area of forewing blackish brown completely (
Figs 71
, 81 ,
91
)............................................ 10

9 . Crown with transverse carina between ocelli...........................................
Evacanthus repexus Distant

- Crown without transverse carina between ocelli.......................................
Bundera bambusana
sp. nov.

10 . Apical half of anteclypeus yellowish white (
Fig. 75
)......................................
Onukia guttata
Li & Wang

11 . Costal margin of forewing with two blackish brown oblique stripes (
Figs 91, 93
)........
Paraonukia wangmoensis
sp. nov.

- Costal margin of forewing without blackish brown oblique stripe (
Figs 81, 83
)..................
Onukia nigra
Li & Wang

12 . Scutellum yellowish brown (
Figs 1, 2
)..........................................
Angustella leucostriata
Li & Wang

- Scutellum blackish brown (
Figs 21, 22
)..................................
Boundarus nigronotus Zhang, Zhang & Wei
